description: Get extensive manual of the command specified
Get a short description of a command
Get the name of current logged-in user
Navigate to specified directory
Navigate to home directory
Remove directory only if it is empty
Remove all files and sub directories recursively
Force remove all files and sub directories recursively
Copy source file to target file
Recursively copy directories and sub-directories
Append new file contents to an old file
Write output to a file
Append output to an existing file
Read contents of a file
Get input from a file1 and write to file2
Pipe one command to another
List all processes running on specified port
Kill processes running with the specified process id
Force kill processes running with the specified process id
List items in current directory with permissions
Change permissions of a file. u - user's permissions, g - group's permissions, o - other's permissions
0 - no permission; 1 - execute only, 2 - write only, 3 - write and execute only, 4 - read only, 5 - read and execute only, 6 - read and write only, 7 - full permissions
